name: Locked (itch)
description:
Locked is the story about Alex Vertué. A boy who lost everything and because of that he gained incredible superpowers. But he's not alone. There are multiple people who gained superpowers because of loss and grieve. Together they team up to make a stand against Xaphan, the demon lord who tries to destroy the world and all creatures in it.

This game is still under development and we try to update as many times as possible so stay tuned!
